name: functions.distributions.permissions.remove
desc: Revoke user access to a custom slack function if permission_type set to named_entities

function_app_id.desc: The encoded ID of the app.

function_callback_id.desc: The callback ID defined in the function's definition file.

function_id.desc: The encoded ID of the function.

errors.access_denied: This actor does not have access to the permissions on this resource.
errors.user_not_found: One or more of the named entities was not found.
errors.invalid_permission_type: This function requires permission_type to be set as named_entities before adding users.
